definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Hong2 Shi2 zi4 hui4

sentences.english: His job was to drive a Red Cross truck carrying wounded away from battle.
sentences.chinese: 他在紅十字會的工作是駕駛卡車，將傷患帶離戰場。

sentences.english: Suprun's project was done in collaboration with Germany's Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: 蘇普倫的研究項目是同德國紅十字會合作完成的。

sentences.english: Immediately, Sumou was sent to Nanning Red Cross Hospital for treatment.
sentences.chinese: 隨即，蘇某被送到南寧市紅十字會醫院進行救治。

sentences.english: Before long, the Red Cross began to pitch tents on high ground north of town.
sentences.chinese: 不久，紅十字會開始在小鎮北面的高地上架設帳篷。

sentences.english: The Red Cross administrates aid in disaster areas.
sentences.chinese: 紅十字會在災區實施救助。

sentences.english: The Red Cross has denied that she is an employee.
sentences.chinese: 紅十字會曾否認她是該會員工。

sentences.english: The Red Cross dispensed charity to refugees.
The All-China Federation of the Red Cross Societies shall be established in the country.
sentences.chinese: 全國建立中國紅十字會總會。

sentences.english: The Chinese Red Cross contributed a generous sum to the relief of the physically disabled.
sentences.chinese: 中國紅十字會慷慨捐贈一筆鉅款以救濟殘疾人。

sentences.english: She has contributed generously to the Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: 她曾慷慨地向紅十字會捐款。

sentences.english: Rich and generous, he contributed two million dollars to the Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: 因爲有錢又慷慨，他捐了兩百萬圓給紅十字會。

sentences.english: "Incorruptibility and cleanness are the lifelines of the Red Cross' work in China," Hua said.
sentences.chinese: “清正廉潔是中國紅十字會工作的準則，”華建敏說。

sentences.english: Standing Vice President Jiang Yiman of the Red Cross Society of China (RCSC) was present at the signing ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 中國紅十字會常務副會長江亦曼參加了簽字儀式。

sentences.english: Dahl even received flowers from the Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: Dahl甚至還收到了紅十字會送的花。

sentences.english: The international and Japanese Red Cross also set up a similar site.
sentences.chinese: 日本和國際紅十字會也都設立一個相似的尋人網站。

sentences.english: Red Cross appeals to the public for generous donations to help the victims in need.
sentences.chinese: 紅十字會懇請市民慷慨捐輸，以助他們渡過難關。

definition: to help the poor/almsgiving for the needy/to assist poor households or poor regions
